metadata.title: CVE-2024-23222 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A type confusion issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue isfixed in iOS 17.3 and iPadOS 17.3, macOS Sonoma 14.3, tvOS 17.3. Processingmaliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Appleis aware of a report that this issue may have been exploited.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-23222` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.43.3-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.43.3-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.43.3-1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.43.3-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.43.3-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.43.3-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.43.3-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.43.3-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.43.3-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.43.3-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.43.3-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.43.3-1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.43.3-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.43.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.43.3-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
